Text: Memes Breaking: Hillary cancels public appearance due to a large crowd of people chanting "Lock Her Up!" The New York Times featured a photo of Hillary Clinton being welcomed to an early voting site in Pompano Beach, Florida on Sunday. Apparently, she didn't stay too long at her rally location at the Pompano Beach Amphitheater. Clinton almost melted at the sight of Trump signs surrounding her and people yelling "Lock Her Up!". A police escort shared what happened: Share on Facebook Posted Tuesday, November 01, 2016 Suggested Videos
